meaningMnemonic: You already know that 中華 means Chinese, and <kanji>麺</kanji> means noodles. Put them together and what have you got? That's right, <vocabulary>Chinese noodles</vocabulary>! Yum!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
